system_description: ScanlonSoft Retail Solution. A SaaS platform running in Azure that provides point of sale retail software to small businesses. React frontend, with APIs hosted in Azure App Service on the backend and an Azure SQL Database.
issue_summary: Critical API outage affecting transaction processing.

conversation_history.message: Our POS system is completely down. None of our transactions are processing, and this is severely impacting our business.
We’re sorry for the inconvenience, Johnathan. Let me check the system logs and investigate. Can you confirm which store locations are affected?
All locations are affected. We’re seeing a ‘500 Internal Server Error’ whenever we try to process a transaction.
Thanks for confirming. I’ve identified an issue with the backend API handling transaction requests. Our team is applying a hotfix now.
Please keep us updated. This is costing us thousands in lost sales.
The hotfix has been deployed, and the API is now fully operational. Can you confirm if transactions are processing correctly on your end?
Yes, it’s working now. Thanks for resolving this so quickly.

resolution: Deployed a hotfix to resolve the backend API outage.
root_cause: A recent deployment introduced a configuration error that caused the transaction processing API to crash.
